title: The NBA season officially kicks off on Tuesday — here are the 20 best players in the league, according to 'NBA 2K20'
text:
The 2019-20 NBA season doesn't tip off until October 22, but fans can use "NBA 2K20" to get an early look at their favorite teams before the start of the season.

"NBA 2K" is the most popular basketball game on the planet. It rates hundreds of players using advanced metrics and game footage, and the ratings are updated every week.

"NBA 2K20" is available now for PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, and PC.

Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories.

This summer has provided one of the wildest NBA off-seasons in league history, with multiple superstar players joining new teams for the 2019-20 season.



Fans will have to wait one more day to see stars like Kawhi Leonard and Kyrie Irving line up and compete with their new squads, but "NBA 2K20," the world's most popular basketball video game, is already offering an early look at this year's top contenders.



NBA 2K's player ratings are a delicate science; the game's creators used advanced metrics and game footage to judge a variety of player attributes and specific traits. Since 2K solidified its place as the top basketball simulator, NBA players have started taking their ratings seriously, and frequently turn to social media to brag about their high scores and lookalike character models.

—Ronnie 2K 2K20 (@Ronnie2K) July 25, 2019

2K updates player ratings every week so things are bound to change once the season gets underway, but even stars like Lebron James and Anthony Davis have been using "NBA 2K20" to try to figure out how their team will come together for a championship push.

description: After a wild summer that sent multiple superstars to new teams, the 2019-20 NBA season is finally here.
